name: Players
description: Returns a list of all players in the league in alphabetical order by last name.

name: Points Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by points per game in descending order.

name: Assists Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by assists per game in descending order.

name: Rebounds Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by rebounds per game in descending order.

name: Offensive Rebounds Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by offensive rebounds per game in descending order.

name: Defensive Rebounds Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by defensive rebounds per game in descending order.

name: Blocks Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by blocks per game in descending order.

name: Steals Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by steals per game in descending order.

name: Turnovers Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by turnovers per game in descending order.

name: Fouls Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by fouls per game in descending order.

name: Field Goals Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by field goal percentage in descending order.

name: 3PT Field Goals Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by three-point field goal percentage in descending order.

name: Free Throws Per Game
description: Returns a list of players ranked by free throw percentage in descending order.
